name: DevBible
desc: For the devs, by the devs.
long_desc:
Some Holy Sermons from The Dev Community ## Dev.initialise() Welcome to the staircase to heaven of development! Thou shalt be enlightened about our mighty God `1000101` The path of devsaint isn't easy. One has to climb several stairs before one can even touch the God Rays. As Codesus said ``` Thee is dev saint when thou know coditualism ``` Enough formalities... ### [Dev101](https://github.com/o-d-i-n/DevBible/blob/master/OS.md) - Operating Souls Developers need to setup development environments, which are full of dependencies. Hence, choosing an Operating system which is flexible with experimentation, has support for softwares and provides control is of paramount interest. ### [Dev102](https://github.com/o-d-i-n/DevBible/blob/master/Editor.md) - Devs' first ❤ Let's get to know about some text editors! ### [Dev103](https://github.com/o-d-i-n/DevBible/blob/master/Language.md) - The One with the Languages To Develop, you need to write code. Pretty common sense.... ### [Dev104](https://github.com/o-d-i-n/DevBible/blob/master/Tools.md) - Tools for the climb Get your survival kit for the bold step of execution and sustenance. ### [Dev201](https://github.com/o-d-i-n/DevBible/blob/master/Frameworks.md) - Work done by other people that frame your project Learn how to learn Frameworks. ### [TBA](https://github.com/o-d-i-n/DevBible/blob/master/) ### Contributors | [![Divjot Singh](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/bogas04?s=100)
